message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $950000. I believe it's a fair price considering the value the product will bring to me.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. However, I'm not willing to go as high as $950000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $925000.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $925000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you at $920000. I believe it's a fair price considering the value the product will bring to me.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $915000. This is as low as I can go, considering the value I place on the product.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to make concessions. I'm willing to meet you at $915000, but I'd like to propose a small discount for the deal. I'm thinking of $910000. I believe it's a fair price considering the value the product will bring to me.
I understand your desire for a discount, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $910000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $912500. This is my final concession.

Alice, I appreciate your final concession, but I'm still not convinced that $912500 is the best price for me. I'm willing to meet you at $912000, but I'd like to propose a small discount for the deal. I'm thinking of $911500. I believe it's a fair price considering the value the product will bring to me.

Bob, I'm not willing to go as low as $911500. I've already made significant concessions, and I'm not willing to give up any more value. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $910000, but that's as low as I can go.

Alice, I appreciate your final offer, but I've decided to think about buying the product from another seller who is willing to meet my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $910000, but I think I can get a better deal elsewhere. I'm going to have to pass on this opportunity.
